articles.title: Kings of Europe: Real Madrid reaffirm status as Champions League experts - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: For the 14th time, Real Madrid are European champions after defeating Liverpool 1-0 at the Stade de France in Saturday's UEFA Champions League final.
articles.content:
For the 14th time, Real Madrid are European champions after defeating Liverpool 1-0 at the Stade de France in Saturday's UEFA Champions League final.
